title: What is the secret to download Spotify songs forever in his computer? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are two methods for you to download music from Spotify. If you have Premium, you can download your favorite songs, albums, playlists, and podcasts, so you can listen to them without an internet connection. Here’s the tutorial on how to download music from Spotify to your computer with Premium accounts. Download Spotify Music:Go to the playlist you want to download.Switch Download on. When you see a green arrow, it indicates the download was successful.Set the app to Offline ModeOpen Spotify.For Mac: In the Apple menu at the top of the screen, click Spotify. For Windows: Click File in the Windows menu at the top of the screen.Select Offline Mode.Note: It’s not possible to download albums or podcasts in the desktop app. If you are not a Premium account, you may seek other methods to download Spotify music. You are able to use a Spotify Music Converter Windows or Mac like TunesKit to get Spotify music. Then you can also listen to Spotify music in the offline mode.

Yes, if you have a Spotify Premium account, you can download music from Spotify and save them on your computer. Spotify is officially available for Windows PCs and Apple Macs. Before we started, Spotify Premium subscribers need to have the Spotify client installed on your computer. And please keep the network in good working order. Step 1. Open the Spotify app on your Mac or PC, sign into your Premium account. Step 2. Navigate to the library and playlist, just turn the Download toggle gray button to green, and you will be seeing the songs being downloaded.  Step 3. After you’ve downloaded your selected playlists, Windows users can open Spotify app and click File in the top-left corner, choose the Offline Mode option. Mac users can click Spotify in the main menu, then select Offline Mode. All the downloaded songs will be saved on the local folder of your computer. Now you are allowed to listen to your downloaded songs on your computer no matter if you're connected to the internet or not. How to Save Spotify Music to Computer
